member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDecon2lsV2PlugIn.clsAnalysisResourcesDecon2ls.GetResources
member.summary: Retrieves files necessary for performance of Decon2ls analysis

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDecon2lsV2PlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDecon2lsBase.IsosFileHasData(System.String)
member.summary: Examines IsosFilePath to look for data lines (does not read the entire file, just the first two lines)
member.returns: True if it has one or more lines of data, otherwise, returns False

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDecon2lsV2PlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDecon2lsBase.IsosFileHasData(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Examines IsosFilePath to look for data lines
member.param: Output parameter: total data line count
True to count all of the data lines; false to just look for the first data line
member.returns: True if it has one or more lines of data, otherwise, returns False

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDecon2lsV2PlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDecon2lsBase.WriteTempParamFileUpdateElementValue(System.Xml.XmlDocument@,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks for the section specified by parameter XPathForSection. If found, updates its value to NewElementValue. If not found, tries to add a new node with name ElementName
member.param: XPath specifying the section that contains the desired element. For example: "//parameters/Miscellaneous"
